metadata.title: CVE-2021-37819 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: PDF Labs pdftk-java v3.2.3 was discovered to contain an infinite loop viathe component /text/pdf/PdfReader.java.

criterions.comment: libitext-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libitext5-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
